name: Rules
text: §326-24  Rules.  The director of health may adopt rules pursuant to chapter 91 necessary for the conduct of all matters pertaining to Hansen's disease, the treatment and care thereof, and other services provided to persons affected with Hansen's disease, and the full and complete governance of the county of Kalawao, except as limited by this chapter. [L 1870, c 33, pt of §1; RL 1925, §1199; am L 1931, c 139, §5; am L 1933, c 118, §1; RL 1935, §1162; RL 1945, §2425; am L 1949, c 53, §17; am L 1951, c 157, §13; RL 1955, §50-26; am L 1965, c 96, §36; HRS §326-24; am L 1969, c 152, §6; am L 1981, c 185, §12; am L 1985, c 250, §10]
